thread.title: The Walking Dead Star Slams Racist T-Shirt Claims
thread.title_full: The Walking Dead Star Slams Racist T-Shirt Claims

author: Charlie Ridgely
title: The Walking Dead Star Slams Racist T-Shirt Claims
text:
The Walking Dead Star Slams Racist T-Shirt Claims Charlie Ridgely Back to Article Image of 
This week, a Negan -themed shirt in the UK has been the talk of the town. Primark, a discount clothing chain, had been selling a novelty shirt from The Walking Dead . The shirt pictured Negan's bat, Lucille, and the words "Eeny meeny miny moe". 
A man claimed that the shirt was racist and offensive, and it caused the chain to immediately remove the shirt from all of its stores. 
According to the man, "The slogan is 'Eeeny meenie miny moe…..' It stops there, but of course we all know what the original said: 'catch a n by his toe.'" He continued, "The graphic has a large American baseball bat, wrapped round with barbed wire, and covered with blood. This image relates directly to the practice of assaulting black people in America. "It is directly threatening of a racist assault, and if I were black and were faced by a wearer I would know just where I stood." 
Of course, on the show, those weren't the words used by Negan. He finished the children's rhyme with a much more popular version; "catch a tiger by his toe." 
Jeffrey Dean Morgan , who portrays Negan on The Walking Dead , had some harsh words to say about this claim. 
Holy crap people are stupid. 'Walking Dead’ Shirt Pulled From Stores After Complaint of Racism https://t.co/cpeIqcxTwJ — Jeffrey Dean Morgan (@JDMorgan) February 22, 2017 
If you follow many Walking Dead fans, you'll notice that his opinion lines up with their views. 
The Walking Dead airs Sundays at 9 pm ET on AMC . For complete coverage and insider info all season long, follow @BrandonDavisBD on Twitter. The Walking Dead Sunday at 9PM EST on AMC ComicBook Composite 86.60 #7 All-Time Comic TV Shows Average rating
